name: ONLY ONE ARM SWIMMING
description:
Game Jam 2019 - ONLY ONE

Its tough to swim with only one arm,  but Creig must swim.

Challenge thee tough pool rivals and race your way to "VICTORY"

Kick with a rhythm using the LEFT and RIGHT arrow keys and use SPACE bar (hold or tap) to use that arm! For a speed boost, dunk that head underwater with the UP arrow key. But don't stay down too long or you'll run out of breath.

Can you guess what the dog only has one of???

Have fun, hope you enjoy playing.
